param.script:
import numpy as np
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns
from datetime import date
from sklearn.preprocessing import FunctionTransformer

def sin_transformer(period):
    return FunctionTransformer(lambda x: np.sin(x / period * 2 * np.pi))
  
def cos_transformer(period):
    return FunctionTransformer(lambda x: np.cos(x / period * 2 * np.pi))

X_2 = inputs[0]

X_2["month_sin"] = sin_transformer(12).fit_transform(X_2[["month"]])
X_2["month_cos"] = cos_transformer(12).fit_transform(X_2[["month"]])

X_2["day_sin"] = sin_transformer(30).fit_transform(X_2[["day"]])
X_2["day_cos"] = cos_transformer(30).fit_transform(X_2[["day"]])

X_2["hour_sin"] = sin_transformer(24).fit_transform(X_2[["hour"]])
X_2["hour_cos"] = cos_transformer(24).fit_transform(X_2[["hour"]])

X_2["winddirection_sin"] = sin_transformer(360).fit_transform(X_2[["winddirection"]])
X_2["winddirection_cos"] = cos_transformer(360).fit_transform(X_2[["winddirection"]])

fig, ax = plt.subplots(3, 1, sharex=True, figsize=(300,8))
X_2[["month_sin", "month_cos"]].plot(ax=ax[0])
X_2[["day_sin", "day_cos"]].plot(ax=ax[1])
X_2[["winddirection_sin", "winddirection_cos"]].plot(ax=ax[2])
plt.suptitle("Cyclical encoding with sine/cosine transformation")
plt.show();

#
#   NOTE : Enter "Out Table Alias"
#   ex)
#       inputDataframe = inputs[0]
#       result = inputDataframe
#
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np

actual = inputs[0]
forecast = inputs[1]

actual["datetime"] = pd.to_datetime(actual["datetime"])
forecast["datetime"] = pd.to_datetime(forecast["datetime"])

actual = actual[["datetime","일조","일사","전운량"]]

data = pd.merge(forecast,actual,how = "left", on = "datetime")
data["datetime"] = data["datetime"].dt.strftime("%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S")

param.script:
#
#   NOTE : Enter "Out Table Alias"
#   ex)
#       inputDataframe = inputs[0]
#       result = inputDataframe
#
import pandas as pd
from datetime import datetime

df = inputs[0]
df['datetime'] = pd.to_datetime(df['datetime'])

df = df.loc[
  ~((df['datetime'] >= datetime(2021,4,1)) & (df['datetime'] <= datetime(2021,4,6)))
  & ~((df['datetime'] >= datetime(2021,7,12)) & (df['datetime'] <= datetime(2021,7,13)))
  & ~((df['datetime'] >= datetime(2021,11,5)) & (df['datetime'] <= datetime(2021,11,9)))
  & ~((df['datetime'] >= datetime(2021,11,17)) & (df['datetime'] <= datetime(2021,12,2)))
]
df['datetime'] = df['datetime'].astype('str')

import pandas as pd

df = inputs[0]

l = ['21', '22', '23', '00', '01', '02', '03', '04']
for i in range(len(df)):
    if df['datetime'][i][11:13] in l:
        df['prediction'][i] = 0
		
df.loc[df['prediction'] <0 , 'prediction'] = 0

param.script:
import numpy as np
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns
from datetime import date
from sklearn.preprocessing import FunctionTransformer

def sin_transformer(period):
    return FunctionTransformer(lambda x: np.sin(x / period * 2 * np.pi))
  
def cos_transformer(period):
    return FunctionTransformer(lambda x: np.cos(x / period * 2 * np.pi))

X_2 = inputs[0]

X_2["month_sin"] = sin_transformer(12).fit_transform(X_2[["month"]])
X_2["month_cos"] = cos_transformer(12).fit_transform(X_2[["month"]])

X_2["day_sin"] = sin_transformer(30).fit_transform(X_2[["day"]])
X_2["day_cos"] = cos_transformer(30).fit_transform(X_2[["day"]])

X_2["hour_sin"] = sin_transformer(24).fit_transform(X_2[["hour"]])
X_2["hour_cos"] = cos_transformer(24).fit_transform(X_2[["hour"]])

X_2["winddirection_sin"] = sin_transformer(360).fit_transform(X_2[["winddirection"]])
X_2["winddirection_cos"] = cos_transformer(360).fit_transform(X_2[["winddirection"]])

fig, ax = plt.subplots(3, 1, sharex=True, figsize=(300,8))
X_2[["month_sin", "month_cos"]].plot(ax=ax[0])
X_2[["day_sin", "day_cos"]].plot(ax=ax[1])
X_2[["winddirection_sin", "winddirection_cos"]].plot(ax=ax[2])
plt.suptitle("Cyclical encoding with sine/cosine transformation");

param.script:
#
#   NOTE : Enter "Out Table Alias"
#   ex)
#       inputDataframe = inputs[0]
#       result = inputDataframe
#
import numpy as np

# Define NMAE loss function
def NMAE(observed, pred, nominal):
    absolute_error = np.abs(observed - pred)
    absolute_error /= nominal
    target_idx = np.where(observed >= nominal*0.1)

    return 100 * absolute_error[target_idx].mean()
  
  
df = inputs[0]

err = NMAE(df['target'].values, df['prediction'].values, 1100)

import seaborn as sns
from datetime import date
from sklearn.preprocessing import FunctionTransformer

def sin_transformer(period):
    return FunctionTransformer(lambda x: np.sin(x / period * 2 * np.pi))
  
def cos_transformer(period):
    return FunctionTransformer(lambda x: np.cos(x / period * 2 * np.pi))

X_2 = inputs[0]

X_2["month_sin"] = sin_transformer(12).fit_transform(X_2[["month"]])
X_2["month_cos"] = cos_transformer(12).fit_transform(X_2[["month"]])

display.label: Filter: 14시 예보 자료만 사용

guide.message: Set data options using Chart Setting Button.
Set data options using Chart Setting Button.

display.description:
17시 기준으로 예측해야 하므로, 전날 14시 예보자료만 사용한다. 

forecast는 '몇시간 뒤'를 예측하는지에 대한 자료이므로, 10 (14+10=24시) ~ 33 (14+33=23시) 를 사용한다.

param.script:
#
#   NOTE : Enter "Out Table Alias"
#   ex)
#       inputDataframe = inputs[0]
#       result = inputDataframe
#
df = inputs[0]

import pandas as pd
df['forecast_time_'] = pd.to_datetime(df['forecast_time'])
df['datetime'] = df['forecast_time_'] + df['forecast'].map(lambda x: pd.DateOffset(hours=x))
df['datetime'] = df['datetime'].astype(str)
df.drop(columns=['forecast_time_'], inplace=True)

import pandas as pd
df = inputs[0]
#df['datetime'] = pd.to_datetime(df['datetime'])
datetime_from = df['datetime'][0]
datetime_to = df['datetime'].values[-1]

every_hour = pd.DataFrame(pd.date_range(start=datetime_from, end=datetime_to, freq='H'), columns=['datetime'])
every_hour['datetime'] = every_hour['datetime'].astype('str')


every_hour = pd.merge(every_hour, df, on='datetime', how='outer')
every_hour['forecast_time'] = every_hour['forecast_time'].ffill()
every_hour["temperature"] = every_hour["temperature"].interpolate()
every_hour["humidity"] = every_hour["humidity"].interpolate()
every_hour["windspeed"] = every_hour["windspeed"].interpolate()
every_hour["winddirection"] = every_hour["winddirection"].interpolate()

import pandas as pd
import numpy as np

df = inputs[0]
df['_datetime'] = pd.to_datetime(df['datetime'])
df['month'] = df['_datetime'].apply(lambda x: x.month)
df['day'] = df['_datetime'].apply(lambda x: x.day)
df['hour'] = df['_datetime'].apply(lambda x: x.hour)
df = df.drop(columns=['_datetime'])
#df['pressure'] = df['pressure'].fillna(df['pressure'].mean())
#df['density'] = df['pressure'] / (np.where(abs(df['temperature']) < 1, 1, df['temperature']))
#df['density'] = 100000 /(287.058*(df['temperature']+273.15))

df['power'] = df['target'].shift(-1)
df['power'] = df['power'].fillna(df['power'].mean())

param.script:
import numpy as np
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns
from datetime import date
from sklearn.preprocessing import FunctionTransformer

def sin_transformer(period):
    return FunctionTransformer(lambda x: np.sin(x / period * 2 * np.pi))
  
def cos_transformer(period):
    return FunctionTransformer(lambda x: np.cos(x / period * 2 * np.pi))

X_2 = inputs[0]

X_2["month_sin"] = sin_transformer(12).fit_transform(X_2[["month"]])
X_2["month_cos"] = cos_transformer(12).fit_transform(X_2[["month"]])


X_2["day_sin"] = sin_transformer(30).fit_transform(X_2[["day"]])
X_2["day_cos"] = cos_transformer(30).fit_transform(X_2[["day"]])

X_2["hour_sin"] = sin_transformer(24).fit_transform(X_2[["hour"]])
X_2["hour_cos"] = cos_transformer(24).fit_transform(X_2[["hour"]])

X_2["winddirection_sin"] = sin_transformer(360).fit_transform(X_2[["winddirection"]])
X_2["winddirection_cos"] = cos_transformer(360).fit_transform(X_2[["winddirection"]])

fig, ax = plt.subplots(3, 1, sharex=True, figsize=(300,8))
X_2[["month_sin", "month_cos"]].plot(ax=ax[0])
X_2[["day_sin", "day_cos"]].plot(ax=ax[1])
X_2[["winddirection_sin", "winddirection_cos"]].plot(ax=ax[2])
plt.suptitle("Cyclical encoding with sine/cosine transformation");

import numpy as np
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns
from datetime import date
from sklearn.preprocessing import FunctionTransformer

def sin_transformer(period):
    return FunctionTransformer(lambda x: np.sin(x / period * 2 * np.pi))
  
def cos_transformer(period):
    return FunctionTransformer(lambda x: np.cos(x / period * 2 * np.pi))

X_2 = inputs[0]

X_2["month_sin"] = sin_transformer(12).fit_transform(X_2[["month"]])
X_2["month_cos"] = cos_transformer(12).fit_transform(X_2[["month"]])

X_2["day_sin"] = sin_transformer(30).fit_transform(X_2[["day"]])
X_2["day_cos"] = cos_transformer(30).fit_transform(X_2[["day"]])

X_2["hour_sin"] = sin_transformer(24).fit_transform(X_2[["hour"]])
X_2["hour_cos"] = cos_transformer(24).fit_transform(X_2[["hour"]])

X_2["winddirection_sin"] = sin_transformer(360).fit_transform(X_2[["winddirection"]])
X_2["winddirection_cos"] = cos_transformer(360).fit_transform(X_2[["winddirection"]])

#       inputDataframe = inputs[0]
#       result = inputDataframe

import numpy as np

# Define NMAE loss function
def NMAE(observed, pred, nominal):
    absolute_error = np.abs(observed - pred)
    absolute_error /= nominal
    target_idx = np.where(observed >= nominal*0.1)

    return 100 * absolute_error[target_idx].mean()
  
  
df = inputs[0]

err = NMAE(df['target'].values, df['prediction'].values, 16000)

import numpy as np
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns
from datetime import date
from sklearn.preprocessing import FunctionTransformer

def sin_transformer(period):
    return FunctionTransformer(lambda x: np.sin(x / period * 2 * np.pi))
  
def cos_transformer(period):
    return FunctionTransformer(lambda x: np.cos(x / period * 2 * np.pi))

X_2 = inputs[0]

X_2["month_sin"] = sin_transformer(12).fit_transform(X_2[["month"]])
X_2["month_cos"] = cos_transformer(12).fit_transform(X_2[["month"]])

X_2["day_sin"] = sin_transformer(30).fit_transform(X_2[["day"]])
X_2["day_cos"] = cos_transformer(30).fit_transform(X_2[["day"]])

X_2["hour_sin"] = sin_transformer(24).fit_transform(X_2[["hour"]])
X_2["hour_cos"] = cos_transformer(24).fit_transform(X_2[["hour"]])

X_2["winddirection_sin"] = sin_transformer(360).fit_transform(X_2[["winddirection"]])
X_2["winddirection_cos"] = cos_transformer(360).fit_transform(X_2[["winddirection"]])

fig, ax = plt.subplots(3, 1, sharex=True, figsize=(300,8))
X_2[["month_sin", "month_cos"]].plot(ax=ax[0])
X_2[["day_sin", "day_cos"]].plot(ax=ax[1])
X_2[["winddirection_sin", "winddirection_cos"]].plot(ax=ax[2])
plt.suptitle("Cyclical encoding with sine/cosine transformation");

import numpy as np
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns
from datetime import date
from sklearn.preprocessing import FunctionTransformer

def sin_transformer(period):
    return FunctionTransformer(lambda x: np.sin(x / period * 2 * np.pi))
  
def cos_transformer(period):
    return FunctionTransformer(lambda x: np.cos(x / period * 2 * np.pi))

X_2 = inputs[0]

X_2["month_sin"] = sin_transformer(12).fit_transform(X_2[["month"]])
X_2["month_cos"] = cos_transformer(12).fit_transform(X_2[["month"]])

X_2["day_sin"] = sin_transformer(30).fit_transform(X_2[["day"]])
X_2["day_cos"] = cos_transformer(30).fit_transform(X_2[["day"]])

X_2["hour_sin"] = sin_transformer(24).fit_transform(X_2[["hour"]])
X_2["hour_cos"] = cos_transformer(24).fit_transform(X_2[["hour"]])

X_2["winddirection_sin"] = sin_transformer(360).fit_transform(X_2[["winddirection"]])
X_2["winddirection_cos"] = cos_transformer(360).fit_transform(X_2[["winddirection"]])

fig, ax = plt.subplots(3, 1, sharex=True, figsize=(300,8))
X_2[["month_sin", "month_cos"]].plot(ax=ax[0])
X_2[["day_sin", "day_cos"]].plot(ax=ax[1])
X_2[["winddirection_sin", "winddirection_cos"]].plot(ax=ax[2])
plt.suptitle("Cyclical encoding with sine/cosine transformation");
